name: Solid Acrylic Resin PChem® BM-97
description: Solid Acrylic Resin PChem® BM-97 is a copolymer of methacrylates. It offers excellent performance on alcohol resistance, durability, weatherability. BM97 is easily soluble in many organic solvents such as ketones, esters, aromatic hydrocarbons. It has good solvent release ability and excellent compatibility with other film forming resins, such as NC, CAB, and also plasticizer. BM97 is widely used in PVC pipe adhesive, plastic coatings where alcohol resistance is strictly required
